info.title: Hacker News Client API
info.description:
## API of Comment Service

This specification describes the endpoints, request/response model of the Hacker News Client API. This API provides REST resources to provide top comments w.r.t the stories to the  mobile application.
the following base URL: ```   https://localhost/api/v1/ ```

tags.name: API#001 Comments
tags.description: All operations marked with 'API#001 Comments' are relevant to comments use case

get.description: returns the top 10 parent comments on a given story, sorted by the total number of comments (including child comments) per thread. Each comment will have the comment's text, the userâ€™s HN handle, and their HN age. The HN age of a user is basically how old their Hacker News profile is in years.

parameters.name: storyId
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the story for which comment needs to be fetched

404.description: BAD REQUEST - server cannot or will not process the request due to requested data not found

500.description: INTERNAL SERVER ERROR - server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

hn-age.description: User's HN Age(how old their HN profile is)

example.text: the quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
